code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{getApplications}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApplicationsList=()=>{const[applications,setApplications]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetch=async()=>{try{const res=await getApplications();setApplications(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetch();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Applications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/applications/new",className:"btn",children:"Create New Application"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Submitted At"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Created At"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:applications.map(app=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:app.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:app.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:app.submitted_at?new Date(app.submitted_at).toLocaleString():'-'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(app.created_at).toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/applications/".concat(app.id),children:"View"})})]},app.id))})]})]});};export default ApplicationsList;
